sourcesContent:
<template>
    <apexChart type="bar" height="300"  :options="chartOptions" :series="series"></apexChart>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name:"SplineChart",
  props:['data'],
    data: function() {
      const categories = Array.from({ length: 12 }, (v, i) => `Tháng ${i + 1}`);
      const revenueByMonth = new Array(12).fill(0);
      this.data.forEach(item => {
      if (item.month && item.totalRevenue) {
        revenueByMonth[item.month - 1] = item.totalRevenue;
      }
    });
      return {
        chartOptions: {
          chart: {
            id: 'line_chart',
          },
          xaxis: {
            categories: this.data.map(item=>item._id),
          },
          title: {
          text: "Doanh thu",
          align: "center", 
          margin: 20, 
          style: {
            fontSize: "18px", 
            fontWeight: "bold", 
            color: "#333", 
          },
        },
          
        },
        series: [{
          name: 'Doanh thu',
          data: this.data.map(item=>item.totalRevenue),
          
        }],
        
      }
    },
  }
</script>
